pages.text: The $(item)Inventory Checker$() emits a $(thing)redstone signal$() if the inventory behind it has more than a certain number of items in a specified slot. Both the slot and the item can be defined in the GUI, alongside an optional $(thing)Item Tag$(), and whether to ignore or match the damage of the specified item. These can also be left blank to match any item that goes in the slot.
